description: You'll love this rejuvenating drink if you're a fan of&nbsp;tiki cocktails. Martin Cate created his own version that tastes just like the one from Trader Vic's!It includes&nbsp;rum which is faithful to the authentic recipe made with orgeat (an almond milk beverage), rich simple syrup, lime juice, and orange curacao—you’ll surely want more.
